About Gameshark Use For Playing on PS2
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Game Shark Codes & Dex Drive Saves: About Gameshark Use For Playing on PS2
By Monsterfreak on Sunday, February 17, 2002 - 04:02 pm:

I have a PS2 and wanted to know what I would have to do to get a Gameshark to work. Like will a PS2 Gameshark work with MR2 if I play it on the PS2?

By Lisa Shock on Sunday, February 17, 2002 - 04:47 pm:

There's a special PSX disc for using with PSX games, that comes with the gameshark for PS2. The PSX gameshark won't work with the PS2. The catch is, all the codes were written long ago, for a model of GS that is no longer made, so some codes will not work at all with the modern GS.
